Package com.cafean.jobstream.common.components

Class PlatformProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.jobstream.common.components.PlatformProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, javax.swing.undo.StateEditable
    public class PlatformProperties
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, javax.swing.undo.StateEditable
    A container for both general and Platform Module specific properties that determine how and where a given job stream will be submitted. This class is edited by the UI provided by the selected PlatformModule and used internally by the Job Stream system.
    See Also:
    PlatformDefinition

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.swing.undo.StateEditable

        public java.lang.String getPlatformID()
